title: Mikhail Pimenov
text:
Mikhail Aleksandrovich Pimenov (; born 19 September 1983) is a former <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a>er.
Club career.
He made his professional debut in the <a href="Russian%20Second%20Division">Russian Second Division</a> in 2002 for <a href="FC%20Mostransgaz%20Gazoprovod">FC Mostransgaz Gazoprovod</a>.
He made his <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> debut for <a href="FC%20KAMAZ%20Naberezhnye%20Chelny">FC KAMAZ Naberezhnye Chelny</a> on 28 March 2007 in a game against <a href="FC%20Spartak-MZhK%20Ryazan">FC Spartak-MZhK Ryazan</a>.
